code:
export const menuItems = [
// Signature rice platters
{
  id: 101,
  name: "Lemongrass Chicken Rice Set",
  description: "Chargrilled lemongrass chicken served with jasmine rice, pickled veggies and house sauce.",
  ingredients: ["🍚 Jasmine Rice", "🍗 Chicken", "🥕 Pickles"],
  price: 85,
  category: "Signature Rice Platters",
  image: "🍗"
}, {
  id: 102,
  name: "Caramelized Pork Belly Clay Pot",
  description: "Slow-braised pork belly with coconut caramel, steamed greens and broken rice.",
  ingredients: ["🍚 Broken Rice", "🥓 Pork Belly", "🥬 Greens"],
  price: 92,
  category: "Signature Rice Platters",
  image: "🍲"
}, {
  id: 103,
  name: "Ginger Fish Fillet Rice",
  description: "Crispy basa fish with ginger-soy glaze, scallion oil and fragrant rice.",
  ingredients: ["🐟 Fish", "🧄 Ginger", "🌿 Scallion Oil"],
  price: 96,
  category: "Signature Rice Platters",
  image: "🐟"
}, {
  id: 104,
  name: "Five-Spice Tofu Bowl",
  description: "Crispy tofu tossed in five-spice caramel with seasonal greens and brown rice.",
  ingredients: ["🥢 Tofu", "🍚 Brown Rice", "🥬 Greens"],
  price: 82,
  category: "Signature Rice Platters",
  image: "🥢"
},
// Family-style rice bundles
{
  id: 201,
  name: "Workday Duo Lunch",
  description: "2 signature rice plates (chef's choice) + 2 sides. Perfect for a focused team lunch.",
  ingredients: ["Serves 2", "Includes 2 sides"],
  price: 220,
  category: "Family Rice Combos",
  image: "👥"
}, {
  id: 202,
  name: "Executive Sharing Tray",
  description: "4 mixed rice platters with seasonal salad & soup. Ideal for boardroom meetings.",
  ingredients: ["Serves 4", "Seasonal salad", "Soup of the day"],
  price: 420,
  category: "Family Rice Combos",
  image: "👨‍👩‍👧‍👦"
}, {
  id: 203,
  name: "Evening Team Feast",
  description: "6 chef-selected rice plates with two large shared sides for after-hours teams.",
  ingredients: ["Serves 6", "2 shared sides"],
  price: 630,
  category: "Family Rice Combos",
  image: "🧑‍🤝‍🧑"
},
// Savory add-ons
{
  id: 301,
  name: "Seasonal Stir-Fried Greens",
  description: "Garlic wok-tossed morning glory finished with oyster sauce.",
  ingredients: ["🥬 Greens", "🧄 Garlic", "🦪 Oyster Sauce"],
  price: 45,
  category: "Sides & Salads",
  image: "🥬"
}, {
  id: 302,
  name: "Green Papaya & Herb Salad",
  description: "Julienned papaya, herbs, roasted peanuts and lime fish sauce dressing.",
  ingredients: ["🥗 Papaya", "🌿 Herbs", "🥜 Peanuts"],
  price: 55,
  category: "Sides & Salads",
  image: "🥗"
}, {
  id: 303,
  name: "House Chili Fish Sauce",
  description: "Brilliantly balanced sweet & spicy sauce to brighten any platter.",
  ingredients: ["🌶️ Chili", "🐟 Fish Sauce", "🍋 Lime"],
  price: 25,
  category: "Sides & Salads",
  image: "🌶️"
},
// Juice extras for bookings
{
  id: 401,
  name: "Sunset Passion Juice",
  description: "Passion fruit, orange and a hint of mint to refresh the team.",
  ingredients: ["🥭 Passion Fruit", "🍊 Orange", "🌿 Mint"],
  price: 45,
  category: "Fresh Juice Extras",
  image: "/images/juice.jpeg"
}, {
  id: 402,
  name: "Cool Cucumber Lime",
  description: "Pressed cucumber with lime and basil, best served chilled.",
  ingredients: ["🥒 Cucumber", "🍋 Lime", "🌿 Basil"],
  price: 45,
  category: "Fresh Juice Extras",
  image: "/images/juice.jpeg"
}, {
  id: 403,
  name: "Golden Pineapple Ginger",
  description: "Tropical pineapple balanced with ginger warmth.",
  ingredients: ["🍍 Pineapple", "🫚 Ginger", "🍯 Honey"],
  price: 45,
  category: "Fresh Juice Extras",
  image: "/images/juice.jpeg"
}];

sourcesContent:
export const menuItems = [
  // Signature rice platters
  {
    id: 101,
    name: "Lemongrass Chicken Rice Set",
    description: "Chargrilled lemongrass chicken served with jasmine rice, pickled veggies and house sauce.",
    ingredients: ["🍚 Jasmine Rice", "🍗 Chicken", "🥕 Pickles"],
    price: 85,
    category: "Signature Rice Platters",
    image: "🍗"
  },
  {
    id: 102,
    name: "Caramelized Pork Belly Clay Pot",
    description: "Slow-braised pork belly with coconut caramel, steamed greens and broken rice.",
    ingredients: ["🍚 Broken Rice", "🥓 Pork Belly", "🥬 Greens"],
    price: 92,
    category: "Signature Rice Platters",
    image: "🍲"
  },
  {
    id: 103,
    name: "Ginger Fish Fillet Rice",
    description: "Crispy basa fish with ginger-soy glaze, scallion oil and fragrant rice.",
    ingredients: ["🐟 Fish", "🧄 Ginger", "🌿 Scallion Oil"],
    price: 96,
    category: "Signature Rice Platters",
    image: "🐟"
  },
  {
    id: 104,
    name: "Five-Spice Tofu Bowl",
    description: "Crispy tofu tossed in five-spice caramel with seasonal greens and brown rice.",
    ingredients: ["🥢 Tofu", "🍚 Brown Rice", "🥬 Greens"],
    price: 82,
    category: "Signature Rice Platters",
    image: "🥢"
  },

  // Family-style rice bundles
  {
    id: 201,
    name: "Workday Duo Lunch",
    description: "2 signature rice plates (chef's choice) + 2 sides. Perfect for a focused team lunch.",
    ingredients: ["Serves 2", "Includes 2 sides"],
    price: 220,
    category: "Family Rice Combos",
    image: "👥"
  },
  {
    id: 202,
    name: "Executive Sharing Tray",
    description: "4 mixed rice platters with seasonal salad & soup. Ideal for boardroom meetings.",
    ingredients: ["Serves 4", "Seasonal salad", "Soup of the day"],
    price: 420,
    category: "Family Rice Combos",
    image: "👨‍👩‍👧‍👦"
  },
  {
    id: 203,
    name: "Evening Team Feast",
    description: "6 chef-selected rice plates with two large shared sides for after-hours teams.",
    ingredients: ["Serves 6", "2 shared sides"],
    price: 630,
    category: "Family Rice Combos",
    image: "🧑‍🤝‍🧑"
  },

  // Savory add-ons
  {
    id: 301,
    name: "Seasonal Stir-Fried Greens",
    description: "Garlic wok-tossed morning glory finished with oyster sauce.",
    ingredients: ["🥬 Greens", "🧄 Garlic", "🦪 Oyster Sauce"],
    price: 45,
    category: "Sides & Salads",
    image: "🥬"
  },
  {
    id: 302,
    name: "Green Papaya & Herb Salad",
    description: "Julienned papaya, herbs, roasted peanuts and lime fish sauce dressing.",
    ingredients: ["🥗 Papaya", "🌿 Herbs", "🥜 Peanuts"],
    price: 55,
    category: "Sides & Salads",
    image: "🥗"
  },
  {
    id: 303,
    name: "House Chili Fish Sauce",
    description: "Brilliantly balanced sweet & spicy sauce to brighten any platter.",
    ingredients: ["🌶️ Chili", "🐟 Fish Sauce", "🍋 Lime"],
    price: 25,
    category: "Sides & Salads",
    image: "🌶️"
  },

  // Juice extras for bookings
  {
    id: 401,
    name: "Sunset Passion Juice",
    description: "Passion fruit, orange and a hint of mint to refresh the team.",
    ingredients: ["🥭 Passion Fruit", "🍊 Orange", "🌿 Mint"],
    price: 45,
    category: "Fresh Juice Extras",
    image: "/images/juice.jpeg"
  },
  {
    id: 402,
    name: "Cool Cucumber Lime",
    description: "Pressed cucumber with lime and basil, best served chilled.",
    ingredients: ["🥒 Cucumber", "🍋 Lime", "🌿 Basil"],
    price: 45,
    category: "Fresh Juice Extras",
    image: "/images/juice.jpeg"
  },
  {
    id: 403,
    name: "Golden Pineapple Ginger",
    description: "Tropical pineapple balanced with ginger warmth.",
    ingredients: ["🍍 Pineapple", "🫚 Ginger", "🍯 Honey"],
    price: 45,
    category: "Fresh Juice Extras",
    image: "/images/juice.jpeg"
  }
];
